title: What Key Shards?
body: I have played countless games recently, and I've gotten zero keyshards. Most of them i won and got s rank "not to brag". Riot I played with my friend, and I've been told that the more friends on your team, the higher chance of keyshard dropping. I'm tired of playing games trying to get a key for awesome skins, but I just haven't gotten jack squat. I realize I'm being a little whiny bitch about this but it-just-SUUUUUCKS. plz rito, halp me out.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It can definitely seem frustrating to not earn a key in a while.  However, the more keys you earn initially, the less chance you have of earning them in the near future.  We have an article that describes this a little more in-depth titled [Feels like I'm not getting many key fragments anymore, what gives?](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)

I hope this alleviates some confusion!

Did you have a data about chest stacking for player who don't buy key in the shop?

It seems that with the actual drop rate of key fragment, I will be forever stuck at 3 or more chest to open because during the time needed to craft a full key, I also get a new chest all the time. 
Did you plan to make change if opening all available chest is impossible for 2-3h /day player?

Hey, I read the article, and I've got a few questions that the article doesn't answer.

* First, is it possible to get more than one shard of the same thing, and if so, does getting the same shard decrease the activation price by another third?
* Second, what can a reroll create? If I reroll three skin shards, do I have a 100% chance to get a skin permanent, or could it be something else? What about three champion shards?
* Third, is it true that one can only obtain sixteen key fragments per month? I've heard it on the Boards, but haven't seen any official Riot confirmation.
* Fourth, is there a way to tell when one's key fragment rate will increase again? I didn't keep track of the match where I got my first key fragment, so I don't know how long ago thirty days passed.

Thanks in advance! (Sorry for not asking these during the Hextech QA...)
